statements: DELETE FROM claims_data WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' AND policy_id = 200 AND claim_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM claims_data WHERE claim_id = 100 AND claim_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM Claims WHERE claim_id = 100 AND claim_date = '2022-01-10'
DELETE FROM Claims WHERE policy_number = 'P123456' AND claim_type = 'Car Accident'
DELETE FROM claims_data WHERE is_fraudulent = true
DELETE FROM claim_documents WHERE is_validated = FALSE AND document_type = 'Invoice';
